name: CurationManager
description: CurationManager. Facilitates on-chain curation of a dynamic array of ethereum addresses.

eventDecorators.name: CurationFinalized
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: CurationPassUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: CurationPaused
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: CurationResumed
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: ListingAdded
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: ListingRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TitleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: addListing
functionDecorators.description: add listing to listings array + address -> curator mapping.

functionDecorators.name: removeListing
functionDecorators.description: removes listing from listings array + address -> curator mapping.

functionDecorators.name: viewAllListings
functionDecorators.description: updates contract so that no further curation can occur from contract owner or curator. add ability for curated voting for finalization of curationoriginally used onlyOwner modifier (centralized) shift to onlyCuratorVoted.
